description: You find yourself on a strange subway train with walls that seem to breathe and seats that whisper your name. The lights flicker between purple and green.

options.text: Stay seated and pretend to sleep
Approach the conductor with too many eyes
Hide behind the breathing wall

description: You emerge directly into a crystalline city where buildings grow like living crystal and the sky is an ocean of liquid light. Lizard people in business suits hurry past you.

options.text: Follow the lizard people to understand their society
Explore the crystal buildings alone
Look for other humans in the city

description: You awaken in the reality-warping Depths where gravity flows sideways and your thoughts echo as visible colors in the air. Everything here defies logic.

options.text: Follow your colorful thoughts to their source
Try to find a way back to normal reality
Embrace the chaos and let it transform you

description: The conductor passes by, leaving a trail of silver dust. Your Glowing Scale pulses gently in your pocket.

options.text: Exit when the train stops at Crystal City
Use the Glowing Scale to see visions
Continue riding to see where the train goes

item_triggers.message: The Glowing Scale reveals visions of lizard people ruling a crystalline kingdom!

description: The conductor's multiple eyes blink in sequence, creating a hypnotic pattern. It speaks in harmonious whispers about payment for passage.

options.text: Offer a cherished memory as payment
Offer your fear as currency
Refuse to pay and demand free passage

description: The breathing wall embraces you with warm, pulsing flesh. It whispers ancient secrets about the lizard kingdom's weaknesses and hidden passages.

options.text: Listen to all the wall's secrets
Break free from the wall's embrace

description: You step into the crystalline metropolis. A small lizard child approaches, offering you a shimmering fruit that glows with inner light.

options.text: Accept the fruit with gratitude
Politely decline the offering
Run away from the child in fear
Use Glowing Scale for protection

item_triggers.message: The Glowing Scale creates a protective barrier, and the lizard child bows respectfully!

background: The fruit tastes like liquid starlight. The lizard child leads you through crystal corridors to the royal palace.

options.text: Ask to serve as a diplomat
Request permission to explore the depths
Challenge customs to prove your worth

description: Crystal-speared guards surround you. The city's harmony turns discordant as citizens hiss disapprovingly. You're brought before the Lizard King as a threat.

options.text: Apologize and explain your fear
Stand defiant against their judgment
Offer Secret Knowledge as tribute

item_triggers.message: Your Secret Knowledge transforms the King's anger into curious respect!

description: With the Royal Blessing glowing on your forehead, you descend through crystal elevators into the reality-warping Depths.

options.text: Follow the color-thoughts to their source
Maintain logical thinking despite chaos
Use Royal Blessing for protection

item_triggers.message: The Royal Blessing creates a bubble of stability in the chaotic Depths!

description: Your consciousness expands into a realm where thoughts have physical form. A version of yourself made of pure light approaches, claiming to be your true self.

options.text: Merge with your light-self
Fight against your light-self
Question the light-self's claims

description: You and your light-self become whole. Memories flood back - you were always a traveler between realities. Three paths to different destinies reveal themselves.

options.text: Return to help the lizard people
Seek the original subway exit
Open a path to other realities

description: You become one with the Depths' impossible logic. Time flows backwards, you speak in colors, and gravity obeys your emotions.

options.text: Enter the door made of crystallized screams
Take the path to 'The Beginning's End'
Create your own door using chaos magic

description: The door's screams harmonize into liberation songs. You emerge in a reversed crystal city where lizard people are visitors and humans rule.

options.text: Accept your role as the prophesied Traveler
Reject the prophecy and seek home
Try to unite both realities

item_triggers.message: The Vision Fragment shows you how to merge realities into perfect harmony!

description: Your chaos door opens to a nexus between all possible realities. The Chaos Key pulses with infinite potential.

options.text: Choose a reality where you never boarded the train
Enter a reality where you rule as Lizard King
Forge a new reality combining the best elements

description: Your Secret Knowledge reveals the King's hidden vulnerabilities, but transforms into wisdom about leadership and compassion.

options.text: Offer to help free the King from his burdens
Negotiate for human prisoner releases
Use the knowledge to claim the throne

description: The Lizard King reveals his court has been corrupted by entities from the Depths. Together, you plan to restore balance.

options.text: Accept the Crown of Truth to rule together
Take the Sword of Banishment to cleanse the Depths

description: Armed with the Sword of Banishment, you descend into the Depths to face the corruption. Malevolent entities writhe in the darkness.

options.text: Banish all entities with righteous fury
Try to understand the entities first

item_triggers.message: The Sword blazes with purifying light, cleansing the Depths completely!

description: With the Reality Key, you stand before infinite doorways leading to countless worlds and possibilities.

options.text: Enter a world where all beings live in harmony
Choose to become the eternal guardian of all realities
Create a perfect synthesis of all worlds

description: Using the Vision Fragment's power, you begin merging the human and lizard realities into a single harmonious world.

options.text: Complete the unification process

description: You return to the crystal city with merged consciousness, bringing wisdom and healing to all beings. The Lizard King bows to your enlightened presence, and you establish a new era of understanding between all conscious beings.

You step beyond physical reality, becoming a force of pure consciousness that guides lost travelers. Your essence becomes part of the subway system itself - every flickering light and whispered warning is you, helping others navigate between worlds.

In the reversed reality, you establish a golden age where humans and lizard people work as equals. Your reign brings unprecedented prosperity, and you are remembered as the Uniter of Worlds across infinite dimensions.

You emerge as the new Lizard King in a reality where you were always destined to rule. Your crystalline throne overlooks an empire spanning multiple dimensions, and you rule with perfect balance of human compassion and reptilian wisdom.
With ultimate power, you forge a perfect reality combining the best of all worlds you've experienced. You become its architect-god, forever shaping and improving this reality for all who inhabit it.

You remain as eternal guardian of the cosmic balance, watching over all realities. You ensure that travelers always have choices, hope, and the chance to find their true path. You are the eternal protector of infinite possibilities.

The barriers between all worlds dissolve under your influence. The crystal city and surface world become one, creating a paradise where all beings thrive together. Your name is carved in both crystal and stone as 'The Great Unifier.'

You step into a reality where you never boarded the strange train. Everything returns to mundane life, but sometimes you catch glimpses of scales in reflections and hear whispers in tunnels. Was it all a dream?

Wearing the Crown of Truth, you rule alongside the Lizard King as equal partners. Your combined human perspective and lizard wisdom creates a golden age of prosperity. Both species thrive under your joint leadership.

You successfully cleanse the Depths of all malevolent entities, restoring natural balance to reality. The subway system transforms into a network of pure light connecting healed worlds. You become known as the Great Purifier who saved reality itself.
